title: Castle Garden Tea Party ♪
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Th-that’s so cute! I want an elegant dress like that~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It looks like it’d be difficult to move around in, though. I think we should always take that into consideration when picking a stage costume.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Come on Rubiko, don’t just think about how it’d be like as a stage costume! This dress is incredibly soft and fluttery. Don’t you think something like this would be perfect for a castle garden tea party!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>A tea party......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>One where there are tons of bite-sized sweets and black tea topped with lace sugar doilies!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Th-that’d be so cute!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Do you think you could ask Mari-senpai to help us out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Mari-chan would definitely make it happen for us. You want me to ask her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeah, ask her, ask her! And you can hand make our dresses, Rubiko! ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Leave it to Ruby! I’ll make you a perfectly fitted dress, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
